thread.title: Distances between Major Canadian Cities -...

title: Distances between Major Canadian Cities -...
text:
Thanks for sharing About.com with others! Most Emailed Articles Distances between Major Canadian Cities: Distances in Miles & Kilometers Canada is a big country, so make sure you have an idea of the distance between cities when planning your travel in Canada. What you imagine to be a short car ride may actually be a day's drive; geography can be deceiving. 
Distances are derived by calculating the shortest route via main roads; they include ferry mileage. Distances in Miles
